info.reset:
Все параметры были сброшены к значениям по умолчанию.
Теперь вы можете сохранить изменения, нажав кнопку «Подтвердить» или отменить их, закрыв эту страницу или проигнорировав это уведомление.

enable.label: Включить пользовательский CSS
enable.title: Включает пользовательские настройки CSS для применения к странице

enable.title: Activate the selected theme for the page

select.label: Select theme
select.title: Select a theme to be applied to the page

enable.title: Добавляет кнопки перемотки вперёд/назад в проигрыватель

time.label: Forward/rewind time
time.title: The amount of time to forward/rewind the video by

enable.label: Automatically disable ambient mode
enable.title: Automatically disables ambient mode when you load a video

enable.label: Automatically disable autoplay
enable.title: Automatically disables autoplay when you load a video

enable.label: Automatically disable closed captions
enable.title: Automatically disables closed captions when you load a video

enable.label: Automatically enable closed captions
enable.title: Automatically enables closed captions when you load a video

enable.label: Automatically maximize player
enable.title: Automatically maximizes the player when you load a video

enable.label: Automatically show more videos on end screen
enable.title: Automatically shows more videos on end screen when you load a video

enable.label: Automatic theater mode
enable.title: Automatically enables theater mode when you load a video

enable.label: Copy video URL with timestamp button
enable.title: Copies video URL with timestamp (?t=123)

enable.label: Default to original audio track
enable.title: Always default to the original audio track

enable.label: Enable save to Watch Later button
enable.title: Adds a button to Home and Subscriptions videos to save the video to the 'Watch Later' playlist

enable.label: Hide AI summary
enable.title: Hides the artificial intelligence summary below videos

enable.label: Hide end screen cards
enable.title: Hides the cards at the end of the video

enable.label: Hide end screen cards button
enable.title: Adds a button to show/hide the cards at the end of the video

enable.label: Hide live stream chat
enable.title: Hides the live stream chat

enable.label: Hide members-only videos
enable.title: Hides videos that are only visible to members

enable.label: Hide Official Artist Videos
enable.title: Hide Official Artist Videos from Home Page

enable.label: Hide paid promotion banner
enable.title: Hides the banner that appears when you watch a video that has a paid promotion

enable.label: Hide playables
enable.title: Hides all playables

enable.label: Hide playlists from homepage
enable.title: Get rid of playlists from homepage

enable.label: Hide scrollbar
enable.title: Hides the pages scrollbar

enable.label: Hide shorts
enable.title: Hides all shorts

enable.label: Hide recommended videos
enable.title: Hides the sidebar that recommends videos

enable.label: Hide translate comment button
enable.title: Hides 'Translate to Language' button under comments

enable.label: Loop button
enable.title: Adds a button to the feature menu to loop the video you're watching

enable.label: Maximize player button
enable.title: Adds a button to the feature menu to maximize the player

enable.label: Open transcript button
enable.title: Adds a button to the feature menu to open the transcript of the video you're watching

enable.label: Open YouTube settings on hover
enable.title: Opens the YouTube settings menu when you hover over the settings button

enable.label: Pause background players
enable.title: Pauses video players in background tabs when you start a new player in foreground tab

enable.label: Remaining time
enable.title: Shows the remaining time of the video you're watching

enable.label: Remember last volume
enable.title: Remembers the volume of the last video you were watching and sets it when you open a new video

enable.label: Remove YouTube /redirect URLs
enable.title: Replaces YouTube redirect by actual URLs, skipping redirect warning dialogue

enable.label: Restore fullscreen scrolling
enable.title: Restores scrolling in fullscreen mode

enable.label: Shorten YouTube video share link
enable.title: Shortens YouTube video share link (youtu.be) by stripping si/feature parameters from it

enable.label: Shorts auto scroll
enable.title: Automatically scrolls to the next short

enable.label: Skip "Video is paused. Continue watching?"
enable.title: Skips the idle dialog that pauses video playback

color.label: Color
color.title: Select the color for the On-Screen Display

hide.label: Hide Delay
hide.title: Specify the time, in milliseconds, before automatically hiding the On-Screen Display

opacity.label: Opacity
opacity.title: Adjust the transparency of the On-Screen Display

padding.label: Padding
padding.title: Adjust the spacing around the On-Screen Display in pixels. This applies specifically to corner On-Screen Display.

position.label: Position
position.title: Select the position of the On-Screen Display

type.label: Type
type.title: Select the type of On-Screen Display

enable.label: Automatic quality adjustment
enable.title: Automatically adjusts the video quality to the selected level.

select.label: Player quality
select.title: The quality to set the video to

select.label: Quality fallback strategy
select.title: The strategy to use when the selected quality is not available

enable.label: Forced playback speed
enable.title: Sets the video speed to what you choose below

buttons.label: Playback speed buttons

select.label: Playback buttons speed
select.title: Amount of speed to be changed per click

buttons.title: Adds buttons to increase or decrease the playback speed of the video you're watching

select.label: Player speed
select.title: The speed to set the video to

enable.label: Отображать информацию о длине плейлиста
enable.title: Отображает общую временную длину плейлиста, сколько было просмотрено и сколько осталось.

select.label: Method to get playlist length
select.title: The way to get playlist length information (API method will fallback to HTML if an error occurs)

select.label: Method to get watched time
select.title: The way to get the amount of time watched (Video Length type only used on watch page)

enable.label: Mark as unwatched button
enable.title: Adds a button to mark videos as unwatched

enable.title: Adds a button to remove videos from the playlist

enable.title: Добавляет кнопку в проигрыватель которая делает скриншот видео

enable.title: Включить усиление громкости

amount.label: Volume boost amount (dB)
amount.title: The amount to boost the volume by

select.label: Volume boost mode
select.title: Choose how volume boost is applied. 'Per video' allows enabling boost for each video individually in the feature menu. 'Global' applies boost to all videos when volume boost is enabled.
